title: Starfield will resurrect Oblivion's most annoying NPC
description: Microsoft's Starfield has revealed the return of Oblivion's most annoying NPC, eclipsing all other Bethesda news.

title: All the Starfield editions and pre-order bonuses have finally been revealed
description: Bethesda has confirmed that there are three different editions of Starfield coming at launch as well as new pre-order bonuses

title: There's a Starfield smartwatch bundled with the game's Constellation Edition
description: Bethesda is releasing a Starfield smartwatch, available to anyone who preorders the game's most expensive edition

title: That Starfield Xbox Series X wireless controller is real and it looks awesome
description: Following an earlier leak, we've gotten official confirmation that the Starfield Xbox controller is indeed real.

title: Starfield is getting the first-ever official custom Xbox Wireless Headset
description: A new version of the Xbox Wireless Headset has been announced at the Starfield Direct, adorned in the game's colors.

title: Sea of Thieves: The Legend of Monkey Island expansion announced
description: Sea of Thieves' next expansion, The Legend of Monkey Island, was just announced at the Xbox Games Showcase.

title: Ubisoft's Star Wars Outlaws announced at the Xbox Games Showcase
description: Ubisoft's first Star Wars game was just shown off early in the Xbox Games Showcase.

title: Microsoft announces 1TB black version of the Xbox Series S coming in September
description: A new version of the all-digital Xbox Series S is arriving which features double the storage space and a new splash of paint.

title: New Atlus RPG Metaphor ReFantazio announced at Xbox Games Showcase
description: Atlus announced Metaphor Re Fantazio, a new RPG, at the Xbox Games Showcase.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty release date announced with new trailer
description: New footage has been revealed for the upcoming Phantom Liberty expansion for Cyberpunk 2077.

title: Overwatch 2 gets new trailer showing off story missions and new game modes
description: Overwatch 2's latest update has gotten a slick new trailer. Titled "Invasion", the new patch promises changes galore.

title: Persona 5 Tactica announced at Xbox Games Showcase
description: Persona 5 Tactica got a reveal during the Xbox Games Showcase at not-E3 2023.

title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth is basically Yakuza 8 and I couldn't be more excited
description: The Yakuza series continues with Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth, and a trailer which washes the hero up on Miami Beach

title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 in-engine trailer reveals an even darker inner monologue
description: A new trailer for Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 has revealed that the sequel features just as much inner horrors to come.

title: Avowed release window revealed with dark fantasy in-engine trailer
description: In-engine footage of Avowed has been revealed at the Xbox Games Showcase in all its action-heavy gameplay.

title: Fable reboot gets comedic trailer involving heroes and giants
description: A huge CGI Richard Ayoade introduces us to the new world of the Fable reboot which confirms the game is in development.

title: Major Google Pixel 8 leak reveals all the camera upgrades on the way
description: Some serious camera upgrades are rumored for the Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro phones arriving in October.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, June 11 (game #503)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
